entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
